The Croatian capital's energy is palpable, and its youthful character pours from corners where hideaway bars buzz into the night with local and foreign crowds.

dayInfo.title: Hvar - Picturesque Scenes
dayInfo.description: Nestled in the Adriatic Sea lies the spectacular Croatian island of Hvar. Here, you will capture scenes of olive-green vineyards and the sloping hillside as well as fragrances of lavender. Your tour will be complete with a traditional Croatian meal at an authentic, family-run tavern in the countryside.

dayInfo.description: A seascape adventure around the Croatian islands will highlight more of the Adriatic Sea's unending luxuries. You will meet the captain of a private speedboat and sail along the turquoise sea to caves that have been carved into the craggy cliffs that compose the seascape. The Blue and Green Caves, which you will swim in today, are reminiscent of places in movies. Inside their deep caverns, the water glows as if shimmering crystals lay in their depths. Your maritime discoveries will continue on pebbled beaches and in translucent water before returning to your accommodation in the afternoon.

A demonstration will reveal the meticulous process of growing, harvesting, and preparing oysters per generations-old techniques. Served with olive oil, wine, rakija , traditional Bulkan brandy, and Buzara sauce, your exquisite tasting experience will leave nothing to be desired alongside a bewitching backdrop.
